original_text: So Jesus' disciples did what he had told them to do. They went and they prepared the Passover meal.
korean_text: 제자들이 예수께서 시키신 대로 하여 유월절을 준비하였더라

sentences.original_text: So Jesus' disciples did what he had told them to do.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 예수님의 제자들은 그가 그들에게 하라고 말한 것을 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: and they prepared the Passover meal.
